name: Parry Shield
desc:
Reduce shield damage by %s, increases shield turn rate by %s and shield unfolding by %s. While maintaining this shield flux cost by an increment on the second power function times %s every %s seconds. Having the shield off decreases the increament every %s seconds.

An insanely resistant and quick shield that is designed to take huge amounts punishment during a short period of time. However, sustaining this shield can easily drain a ship of all its energy due to its violatile nature.
short: Shield is faster and more resistant, but takes more flux to sustain.
